GSD.description:
xen/blkfront: fix leaking data in shared pages

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.204 by commit 42112e8f94617d83943f8f3b8de2b66041905506. For more details please see the references link.
